metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14261 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the SDK in Bento4 1.5.0-616, the AP4_StszAtom class in Ap4StszAtom.cpp file contains a Read Memory Access Violation vulnerability. It is possible to exploit this vulnerability by opening a crafted .MP4 file.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
